name: voltgold-yt
description: High performance CLI YouTube downloader (video / audio / shorts / playlists). Forked from pyutube and enhanced by VoLTGoLD.

scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "chore: update changelog" && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "chore: update changelog" && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "chore: update changelog" && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags

author: VOLT5775 <https://github.com/VOLT5775>
